001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.CRServo;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
005
006public class CRServoBuilder extends HardwareBuilder<CRServo> {
007    public CRServoBuilder(String name) {
008        super(name);
009    }
010
011    public CRServoBuilder(CRServo device) {
012        super(device);
013    }
014
015    public CRServoBuilder(int port) {
016        super(port);
017    }
018
019    public CRServoBuilder direction(DcMotorSimple.Direction dir) {
020        product.setDirection(dir);
021        return this;
022    }
023
024    public CRServoBuilder forward() {
025        return direction(DcMotorSimple.Direction.FORWARD);
026    }
027
028    public CRServoBuilder reverse() {
029        return direction(DcMotorSimple.Direction.REVERSE);
030    }
031}
